entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump You’re on track to having the worst pandemic in history because you didn’t bother to test until it was too late. You’ve already failed. There’s nothing you can do to fix the mess you’ve made. Not a “hoax” after all. I guess those 15 cases didn’t go down to 0 after all. Twit.
